metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0825 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.23 and 7.x before 7.11 does not verify that Attribute Exchange (AX) information is signed, which allows remote attackers to modify potentially sensitive AX information without detection via a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Rui Wang, Shuo Chen and Xiao Feng

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
